attributes.review: It took me too many times to download and delete this app because it wouldn’t work and on the last try it took over an hour to download. All i see them taking about is blm but ALL LIVES MATTER, and it’s so fake they pretend to be the real President Trump which is so horrible and talk about how lgbtq+ will get equal rights which goes against god. AND the fact that they are trying to steal all my information and delete it. Don’t trust this app at all it’s fake and is going against everything Trump has done #Trump 2020🇱🇷🇱🇷🇱🇷🇱🇷🇱🇷 MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN
